articles.title: Scientists to perform Eddington experiment during April's total solar eclipse - Africanews English
articles.description: Portland Community College physics professor Toby Dittrich plans to perform a modern version of the Eddington experiment during the eclipse
articles.content:
Aprils total solar eclipse promises to be a scientific bonanza, thanks to new spacecraft and telescopes and cosmic chance.
The moon will be extra close to Earth, providing a long and intense period … [+1655 chars]
